channel.title: Blogs on The Backgarden Herbarium
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on The Backgarden Herbarium

item.title: Welcome to the Herbarium
item.description: There’s this terrific series of books by Ellis Peters about a medieval monk Brother Cadfael. When he’s not solving murders and other mysteries that crop up around his monastery, he’s working in the herbarium. The BBC production of Cadfael is good fun, and I remember being particularly captivated by the sight of his herbarium. When I first watched it, shortly after we moved our family from America to the Scotland, I thought to myself: “Self.
